Issue.creator: greg.haskins
Issue.summary: golang chaincode containers do not reliably exit if peer dies
Issue.description: Chaincode processes form a GRPC link to the peer. I have noted that in v1.0.1, it is possible to kill the peer and the chaincode containers continue to run. Expected behavior is that the shim detects GRPC has severed and terminates the process which in turn will terminate the container.
